website_summaries.verdict: This floor jack and tire inflator kit stands out for its 17.7" lift capacity and its ease of use, but some question its 5 ton capacity claims.
pros: Other tools include a tire inflator and a built-in flashlight
12V power from the cigarette lighter or battery
Lifts a vehicle in under a minute
cons: User manual is a bit lacking, and could be more detailed
Some buyers claim that this jack will not lift 5 tons

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent for lifting my mid size SUV.
customer_reviews.text: Only used this 5 ton jack today but very impressed with the lift capacity for my Mercedes GLK250 SUV. I built a steel insert to fit the vehicle jack port on the frame to make lifting a little safer. Check out the video to see the jack in action. I got the 3 in 1 as I did not need the impact wrench supplied in the 4 in 1.
customer_reviews.author: David Takeda

customer_reviews.title: Drivers must have items
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on my Nissan Maxima as soon as I got it. Everything works well. It takes less than a minute to lift the car up and very easy to loosen the nuts with the impact wrench. The wrench spins up 3 to 4 seconds before it hits the bolt and 2 or 3 hits will tighten the nuts. It is better to do the final calibration with a torque wrench after tightening with this wrench.the pump is good. Labour saving and low noise. I would strongly suggest to read the user’s manual before using this tool set. I feel peace of mind with it for roadside emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Eerdun Baolide

customer_reviews.title: Not a 5T jack maybe 2T
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this jack at maybe 2 to 3 Ton, not 5T as advertised. It did lift my Rav4 and my 99 lincoln. There was a loose piece of metal inside the compressor gauge. The impact wrench worked well and the unit is pretty handy for cars and light trucks. The plastic carrying case was badly damaged due to very poor packing. I might have kept this unit for the Rav4 and the nice impact wrench but the load capacity and damage caused me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Good lifting range and loading capacity
customer_reviews.text: Now it's camping season. I bought this item for roadside emergency. I tested it for lighting, jacking and pumping. It's easy to use, good lifting range and loading capacity.It's also quick for lifting and pumping. The noise is low. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Great for changing tires.  Must have for road emergencies
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. At first I thought it didn’t work because it didn’t tighten or loosen bolts. You have to let it run for 1-2 seconds then it catches the bolts then tightens/ loosens them. It comes with LED light so you can use it even in the dark. It has an adaptor so you can connect it directly to the battery. The only thing I didn’t like is that the light doesn’t have an on/off button. As soon you it is plugged to a battery source, the light remains on constantly.
customer_reviews.author: European Newby

customer_reviews.title: Won't lift even a portion of listed capacity.
customer_reviews.text: First, cord is too short to reach from truck to camper. Battery hookup did work, but limited the available power. Then, I ran it up and down with no load as instructed. Tried to lift the camper (4000 lb), but would not. Then tried to lift one tire (2000 lb) but it would not extend. Suspect internal failure.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Try that to jack up my car inside the garage. It took about 1 minute to lift up the car wheel without any effort. Much easy and faster than manual one. The package also comes with electric impact wrench and inflator to loose and pump the tire quickly. Must have tool for roadside assistance.
customer_reviews.author: peng zhang

customer_reviews.title: It would be great if the user's manual could provide more details on ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if the user's manual could provide more details on the product, although it's not hard to find instructions online.But overall it's a great toolkit for my new civic. It's very easy to handle and efficient. It takes only about 30 seconds to lift the vehicle and noise is tolerable especially it's for emergency road-side use. The cable is long enough for most sedans and SUVs. I'll say it's a good choice to have it in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Dongning Shao

customer_reviews.title: Garbage tool !
customer_reviews.text: Garbage!, pumped up my tires TWICE and then it died and wouldn't turn on again! Definitely will return it even after returning window is closed 2 weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my sons tire when he was stranded and needed to change out his tire. So easy, durable and much better to use instead of the standard car equipment and much safer
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: jack lift works fine
customer_reviews.text: While the jack seems to work fine on my BMW x5 35D ,the impact wrench was disappointing.I tried to remove a wheel from the same car and while loosing a bolt the fuse inside the plug blew up while the vehicle was still in the air. Luckily the compressor had a spare fuse inside and i was able to replace it and lower the car back on the ground
customer_reviews.author: daniel trambitas

customer_reviews.title: Very useful when lifting the car for repair
customer_reviews.text: I had a mechanic fixing my car at home and we had to use it for lifting the car. It worked great. I have only used it once with a Toyota Corolla, still pending to test it on my Jeep Grand Cherokee.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: I thought a good value for what I recived
customer_reviews.text: It is a good jack should have bought one before now easy to use.If I never use it at least I know I have it to use. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: Performed well, very functional
customer_reviews.text: This wrench actually worked perfectly . Used immedately once I got. Spin internally and loosen the lug nut. Easy to understand and control. No more tough wheel replacement anymore. Cost only 2-day shipping, love this. Five stars and commend for all.
customer_reviews.author: YuZhan

customer_reviews.title: would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and was worried about the quality of the build. But so far after two months of using it with fairly frequent use it is holding up
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS ONLY GOOD FOR AIRING UP TIRES. JACK DOESN'T WORK AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wills

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: theres not anything to dislike this jack.BEST tool i have.my brther love it and wants 1 juust like it.
customer_reviews.author: RICKY LAWS

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have spent money on in awhile! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: AAW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use it and it was defective. Sent them back. Better to use a tee wrench
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weidman

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me... Couldn't fit under my car and I drive a 2018 Type-R stock
customer_reviews.author: Jamar S.

customer_reviews.title: Roadside assistance emergency
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but I'm sure it'll be very helpful for me when I do need it
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Hing

customer_reviews.title: Worked good until it stopped working..
customer_reviews.text: Used it 4 times.. the 4th time it got the wheel 4 inches off the ground and just turned off.. wouldn’t go up or down.. air compressor worked, light worked.. but the lift would not.. had no choice but to back off the jack destroying it..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Fake item
customer_reviews.text: When I received it May 2019 I try one time after that I keep it in my car in March 2020 I had flat tire I try it and after I took off 3 tire screws Is not working I try 1 hour because I stuck in highway and I cost $300 tow truck is is fake item
customer_reviews.author: Hany

customer_reviews.title: Concord195@hotmail.com.  Erskine Cumberbatch
customer_reviews.text: I brought the Jack on the 28 January 2019 got it shipped to Barbados last month from Miami. I used it for the first time yesterday to Jack up my apv Suzuki van it Jack it up but only brought it half way down. I had to use another Jack to get the van down. What to do?
customer_reviews.author: erskine cumberbatch

customer_reviews.title: Either one thing not working look all returned before too
customer_reviews.text: Hi received 3 time either one thing is not working every time look all open n return box I do not want replacement please just refund my fund sorry not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks the first time you use it.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried two of the impact wrenches and both have broken almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the product quality. Love it! It is quite convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: annie.lu

customer_reviews.title: Not that strong for a F350.
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved the jack, I have an F350 truck and it does not lift the truck. I think you sent me the smaller jack because the one I ordered is suppose to lift 5 tons or 11,000 lbs., surely it would be more than what I need but it does not work....
customer_reviews.author: Al.

customer_reviews.title: compressor worked once thin quit...will not run again....fuse not blown?
customer_reviews.text: aired up one tire, now it will not work. Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wrench
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wrench. It takes 3 to 4 seconds to lose the nuts and 2 or 3 hits to lighten them. It is very easy to use and labour saving. It is better to finish off the tightening with a torque wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Hao

customer_reviews.title: Electric jack kit
customer_reviews.text: Very handy kit. Amazon should use some type of filler for shipping box. This performs great. Tested it out as soon as it arrived. Lifted my 5k lbs SUV, filled my tire with 6lbs of air & changed tire on my utility trailer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Got one for Christmas, impact was very cheap and didn’t work. Very slow. Don’t buy. Maybe for $29.95
customer_reviews.author: ernest watts

product_meta.title: M PLUS 3 in 1 12V DC 5T (11023lb) Electric Hydraulic Floor Jack with inflator Pump and Flashlight Portable Car Repair Tool Kit Ideal for Vehicle Repairing and Tire Replacing
feature_bullets: EFFICIENT: Work with 12v vehicle outlet, the car can be lift in less than a minute by the jack, the tire can be inflated automatically by the pump.
CONVENIENT: The design of the jack is succinct and compact,easy to go with the portable box for transport and storage.
MULTIFUNCTION: Jack, pump and flashlight together form up an essential tool set that can meet multi-demands for outdoor emergency.
SAFE: Built-in safety device prevents the jack from falling even out of power and the jack will stop working automatically when reaching the height limit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars138 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
